data.name: Waifu Klondike Solitaire
data.detailed_description:
Solitaire for the cultured gamer in us all.

Play against a selection of 2D girls, gradually stripping them of their clothes as you complete the round.

Features

  • 5 Girls to choose from with more on the way!
  • Adjustable difficulty modifiers for an easier or harder time.
  • Additional abilities like Grand Reshuffle & Pocket Space to prevent you from getting stuck or reaching an unwinnable state.
  • Whacky challenges like "Opposite Day" & "Spaghetti Out Of My Pockets"
  • Touchscreen & Controller support!
  • Drag, tap, and Auto-move card interaction supported.
  • Boobs.

Characters

  • Betsy - Cow girl
  • Madeline - Vampire girl
  • Devyn - Clown girl
  • ???
  • ???

All characters depicted are consensual adults over the age of 18.
Warning: Game contains nudity.

data.short_description: Solitaire for the cultured gamer in us all. Play against a selection of 2D girls, gradually stripping them of their clothes as you complete the round. Also available in Safe For Work mode.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10 capable
